method.text: Melt the olive oil and <sup>2</sup>/<sub>3</sub> of the butter in a large saucepan. Add the celery, onion and mushrooms. Fry together for 3 min. Remove the vegetables with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the bacon and chicken to the pan. Fry for 5-8 min until well browned.
Add the stock to the pan with the bouquet garni. Bring to the boil. Return the vegetables to the pan. Cover and simmer fro 35-40 min.
Meanwhile, melt the remaining butter in another saucepan. Add the flour. Cook for 1 min, stirring constantly.
Strain the liquid from the chicken. Gradually stir in the flour, stirring constantly until all is incorporated. Stir in the wine and simmer for 2-3 min until thickened slightly.
Bring to the boil. Add the chicken and vegetables. Simmer for 3 min. Season to taste.
